text:
My name is Pedro Azevedo, I was born in Portugal in 2001.
 My interests include Tecnology, Basketball, Music especially playing drums, History and Nature
Started High School in Salesianos de Lisboa in the Science an Tecnologies course, Since I was in high school I started to develop a big interest in tecnologies, and everything around.

Started the degree in Informatic and Multimedia Engineering in Instituto Superior de Engenharia de Lisboa, In 2020 I started to take the Informatic and Multimedia Engeneering degree, with the intention of exploring the area of developing platforms, create digital content, and AI. I will finish the degree in February 2024.

In september of 2022 I started an exchange program in Fontys University of Applied Sciences in the program ICT and Media Design. Here I learnt to use some tools to desing media content, as working with images, 3d models and enviorments, audio and more. I also got some mechanism, ways and tools to come up with ideas and bring them to live in a way that the user can connect easly to the product. Finaly I learnt more about web development, how to collaborate with a team and manage a project with git, how to connect with API's, develop platforms with moders JS, SCSS and using frameworks like Vue.js.
